isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: HOLSET SS 296 AND QE 296/338

svcsection.title: AIR COMPRESSOR: HOLSET SS 296 AND QE 296/338

lev1.title: SS 296 COMPRESSOR
lev1.para: The SS 296 air compressor ( Figure 1) is a single cylinder, 3-leg unloader, conventional model with direct/remote air governor mounting, with a rated displacement of 13.2 cubic feet of air per minute.

The compressor is constructed of two major assemblies: the head and the crankcase. The head houses the unloader body and the intake valve and is installed on the upper portion of the crankcase. The crankcase is a one-piece casting combining the cylinder block and crankcase. The upper portion of the casting houses the cylinder bore and the lower portion houses the crankshaft, pump adapter and main bearings.

lev1.title: QE COMPRESSOR ( Figure 2)
lev1.para: The QE air compressor ( Figure 2) is a fully turbochargeable, single cylinder E-Type model with large, efficient valves. The QE 296 model has a rated displacement of 13.2 cubic feet of air per minute (CMF). The QE 338 model has a rated displacement of 15 cubic feet of air per minute (CMF).

The compressor is constructed of two major assemblies: the head and the crankcase. The head contains the unloader body, head and valve body, with intake and exhaust valves, and is installed on the upper portion of the crankcase. The crankcase is a one-piece casting combining the cylinder block and crankcase. The upper portion of the casting houses the cylinder bore and the lower portion houses the crankshaft, pump adapter and main bearings ( Figure 3).
